trends: There have been 82 other sightings in Washington
There were no other sightings in Washington on or around April 6th 2008
divs: sighting detailsthis is a report for my friend who did not want to report this sighting. we had lunch at the conway pub and eatery. my friend stepped outside to smoke and wait by the truck, while i was finishing my meal and paying the bill. when i reached the truck (across the street from the pub) my friend had a startled look and immediatly said "dude i just saw a ufo". he described it as a dark (black) object, approx 300 feet in altitude, approx the size of a dime at arms length. the object was traveling south to north for approx 1\4 to 1\2 mile, the angle above the horizon was approx 70 degrees (during the observed period) the object made a sharp turn to the east and shot away a tremendous speed. my friend was quite disturbed about it and talked about it for at least the next 1\2 hour, he told me this has changed his life. i have had my own sighting some years ago and did not doubt my friends report for even a second.
Summary: Object appared made a turn and shot away
